answers.answer: Both what?sever weight loss is usually a sign of Type 1 diabetes.   neropathy can be painful OR can be pain free  what neropathy is is loosing feeling so he may have gone through the pain part and is now into pain free because his nerves have died and so cant transmit pain.sudden and severe weight loss is very bad it may mean he has VERY high BG and he could end up in DKA  which can be life threatening.  If he is not under an MD care he needs to be..... and NOW.

question: By knowing someone that has both, along with mild neorapthy wouldnt it be some signs that the person is having discomfort?  The only sign i have seen is my boyfriends weight loss and its sinficiant enough to scare me.
title: pancretics & diabetes
